Display the subdivision data here!

id {{element.id}}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { SubdivisionDataDisplayService } from "src/app/subdivision-data-display/subdivision-data-display.service"; export interface SubDivision {} @Component({ selector: "app-subdivision-data-display", templateUrl: "./subdivision-data-display.component.html", styleUrls: ["./subdivision-data-display.component.css"], }) export class SubdivisionDataDisplayComponent implements OnInit { sortType: string = "asc"; // defaoult value sortField: string = "id"; // defaoult value pageNum: number = 1; totalSubDivisions: number = 0; isLoading: boolean = false; subDivisions: Array = []; constructor(private subDivisionService: SubdivisionDataDisplayService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadData(); } async loadData() { this.isLoading = true; await this.subDivisionService .getAll(this.pageNum, this.sortField, this.sortType) .subscribe((result: any) => { console.log(result); //this.subDivisions = subdivisions; /* if (result.status == "ok") { this.subDivisions = result.message.tasks; this.totalTasks = result.message.total_task_count; }*/ this.isLoading = false; }); } }
